name: Conga Line Survival
description:
Controls

Direction = WASD/Arrow Keys

Sacrifice/Shoot = Space/Enter

How to play

Pick up people and add them to your conga line. Big red dancers are trying to stop you. When you're in danger, you can sacrifice a dancer to shoot a laser out in front of you. See how long of a conga line you can make!

Download Project Files at the bottom of the page.

Ludum Dare Page

@fashionbatman

Game Made With Unity

Art Made In Gimp 2

Sound Made With OP-1 and FLStudio
